title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, the perfect combination of comfort, style, and support for plus-size women. This pack includes a stunning leopard satin bra, along with other colors such as white and nude, offering a variety of options to suit your mood and outfit.

With sizes ranging from 32C to 50DD, we've got you covered no matter your shape or size. The adjustable straps in the front allow you to customize the fit for maximum comfort throughout the day. 

Made from a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra provides a soft and stretchy feel against your skin. The full coverage design ensures a secure and supportive fit, while the wirefree construction offers freedom of movement without sacrificing support.

The pack includes an everyday bra and one satin bra, giving you the versatility you need for any occasion. The leopard print adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to your lingerie collection.

Not only does this bra provide exceptional comfort and style, but it also features wide bands and rows of hook-and-eye closures for added support. The adjustable straps in the front allow you to find the perfect fit for your individual needs.

Upgrade your lingerie collection with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack. Embrace your curves and feel confident and beautiful all day long. Don't miss out on this must-have plus-size bra pack, order yours today!
